SELECT F.PRIPID, F.CREATETIME,E.ENTNAME,E.ENTTYPE_CN,M.USERNAME,COUNT(F.PRIPID) AS COUNT FROM BL_FOLLOW F,BL_ENTERADDITIONINFO E,BL_MEMBER M WHERE F.MEMBER_ID=M.ID AND F.PRIPID=E.PRIPID
and F.CREATETIME >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T')
and F.CREATETIME <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T')
GROUP BY F.PRIPID ORDER BY COUNT(F.PRIPID) DESC LIMIT 0,10

SELECT C.PRIPID, C.CREATETIME,E.ENTNAME,E.ENTTYPE_CN,M.USERNAME,COUNT(C.PRIPID) AS COUNT FROM BL_COMPLAINT C,BL_ENTERADDITIONINFO E,BL_MEMBER M WHERE C.MEMBER_ID=M.ID AND C.PRIPID=E.PRIPID
and C.CREATETIME >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T')
and C.CREATETIME <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T')
GROUP BY C.PRIPID ORDER BY COUNT(C.PRIPID) DESC LIMIT 0,10

SELECT K.LOGID,K.KEYWORDS,K.LOGTIME,K.REMARK,COUNT(K.KEYWORDS) AS COUNT FROM SYS_LOG_KEYWORD K WHERE 1=1
and DATE_FORMAT(k.LOGTIME,'%Y-%m-%d %T') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T')
and DATE_FORMAT(k.LOGTIME,'%Y-%m-%d %T') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T')
and K.MEMBER_ID=#{memberId}
GROUP BY K.KEYWORDS ORDER BY COUNT(K.KEYWORDS) DESC LIMIT 0,10

SELECT O.LOGID,O.ENTNAME,O.ENTTYPE,O.REGNORE,O.MODULENAME,O.PRIPID,O.LOGTIME,O.REMARK,COUNT(O.PRIPID) AS COUNT FROM SYS_LOG_OPERATION O WHERE 1=1
and DATE_FORMAT(O.LOGTIME,'%Y-%m-%d %T') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T')
and DATE_FORMAT(O.LOGTIME,'%Y-%m-%d %T') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T')
GROUP BY O.PRIPID ORDER BY COUNT(O.PRIPID) DESC LIMIT 0,10

SELECT O.ENTNAME ,O.MODULENAME ,O.LOGTIME , (SELECT M.USERNAME FROM BL_MEMBER M WHERE M.ID = O.MEMBER_ID) USERNAME FROM SYS_LOG_OPERATION O WHERE 1 = 1

and DATE_FORMAT(O.LOGTIME,'%Y-%m-%d %T') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{pd.endTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T')
